summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3748 for the improvement of Francis Avenue, from North 65th Street to North 66th Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by grading and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 45994, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
